name: Oust
description:
CONTROLS:

Move: WASD

Basic Attack: Right Click

Spell Attack: Left Click

Change Spell: Q, E, F

Dialogue: Spacebar

Oust is a bullet hell adventure. Proceed through randomly generated levels fighting angels and demons to challenge God and the Devil. This game was made over 9 days for Godot Wild Jam #54 : Curse Theme. Thanks for playing! The game is playable in browser, but I recommend downloading for the best experience. Downloading is free. Available on Mac, Windows, Linux, and modern browsers.

Made by:

Neverknow247: Game and Concept Designer, Programmer, Artist, Voice of the Angel

Lizzyroni: Composer, Writer, Concept Designer, Voice of God

Firehazard159: Concept Designer, Writer, Voice of the Devil, Playtester/QA
